verses.verse: Ho, <S%H1945><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> that thirsteth, <S%H6771><s%> come <S%H1980><s%> ye to the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and he that <S%H834><s%> hath no <S%H369><s%> money; <S%H3701><s%> come <S%H1980><s%> ye, buy, <S%H7666><s%> and eat; <S%H398><s%> yea, come, <S%H1980><s%> buy <S%H7666><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> and milk <S%H2461><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> and without <S%H3808><s%> price. <S%H4242><s%>

Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> do ye spend <S%H8254><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> for that which is not <S%H3808><s%> bread? <S%H3899><s%> and your labor <S%H3018><s%> for that which satisfieth <S%H7654><s%> not? <S%H3808><s%> hearken diligently <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, and eat <S%H398><s%> ye that which is good, <S%H2896><s%> and let your soul <S%H5315><s%> delight itself <S%H6026><s%> in fatness. <S%H1880><s%>

Incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear, <S%H241><s%> and come <S%H1980><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me: hear, <S%H8085><s%> and your soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live; <S%H2421><s%> and I will make <S%H3772><s%> an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you, even the sure <S%H539><s%> mercies <S%H2617><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> him for a witness <S%H5707><s%> to the people, <S%H3816><s%> a leader <S%H5057><s%> and commander <S%H6680><s%> to the people. <S%H3816><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> thou shalt call <S%H7121><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> that thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> and nations <S%H1471><s%> that knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> thee shall run <S%H7323><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee because <S%H4616><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and for the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he hath glorified <S%H6286><s%> thee.
Seek <S%H1875><s%> ye the LORD <S%H3068><s%> while he may be found, <S%H4672><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> ye upon him while he is <S%H1961><s%> near: <S%H7138><s%>

Let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> his way, <S%H1870><s%> and the unrighteous <S%H205><s%> man <S%H376><s%> his thoughts: <S%H4284><s%> and let him return <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and he will have mercy <S%H7355><s%> upon him; and to <S%H413><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he will abundantly <S%H7235><s%> pardon. <S%H5545><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> my thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are not <S%H3808><s%> your thoughts, <S%H4284><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> are your ways <S%H1870><s%> my ways, <S%H1870><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> as the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are higher <S%H1361><s%> than the earth, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> are my ways higher <S%H1361><s%> <S%H1870><s%> than your ways, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> and my thoughts <S%H4284><s%> than your thoughts. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4284><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the rain <S%H1653><s%> cometh down, <S%H3381><s%> and the snow <S%H7950><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and returneth <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> watereth <S%H7301><s%> <S%H853><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and maketh it bring forth <S%H3205><s%> and bud, <S%H6779><s%> that it may give <S%H5414><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> to the sower, <S%H2232><s%> and bread <S%H3899><s%> to the eater: <S%H398><s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> shall my word <S%H1697><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> that <S%H834><s%> goeth forth <S%H3318><s%> out of my mouth: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6310><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me void, <S%H7387><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> it shall accomplish <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> I please, <S%H2654><s%> and it shall prosper <S%H6743><s%> in the thing whereto <S%H834><s%> I sent <S%H7971><s%> it.

For <S%H3588><s%> ye shall go out <S%H3318><s%> with joy, <S%H8057><s%> and be led forth <S%H2986><s%> with peace: <S%H7965><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and the hills <S%H1389><s%> shall break forth <S%H6476><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you into singing, <S%H7440><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall clap <S%H4222><s%> their hands. <S%H3709><s%>

Instead <S%H8478><s%> of the thorn <S%H5285><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> the fir tree, <S%H1265><s%> and instead <S%H8478><s%> of the brier <S%H5636><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> the myrtle tree: <S%H1918><s%> and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for a name, <S%H8034><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> sign <S%H226><s%> that shall not <S%H3808><s%> be cut off. <S%H3772><s%>
